article_title: After 125 years, Barney Insurance is gratefully paying it forward
article_text:
Christopher Burns MINDEN — Christopher R. Burns, 35, of Kearney died Sunday, May 22, 2016, as the result of an automobile accident in Kearney County.

Shanon Geisler KEARNEY — Shanon M. Geisler, 26, of Kearney died Saturday, May 21, 2016, at CHI Health Good Samaritan.

Jose Vargas KEARNEY — Jose Francisco Vargas, 19, of Gibbon died Thursday, May 19, 2016, at CHI Health Good Samaritan in Kearney.

Michael Ross GIBBON — Michael J. “Mick” Ross, 69, of Gibbon died Saturday, May 21, 2016, at his home.

Klit Brewer KEARNEY — Klit A. Brewer, 66, of Kearney died Friday, May 20, 2016, at CHI Health Good Samaritan.

Jean Benjamin COZAD — Jean M. Benjamin, 80, of Lexington died Sunday, May 22, 2016, at Cozad Community Health System.

Verna Kiburz KEARNEY — Verna Mae Kiburz, 85, of Kearney died Sunday, May 22, 2016, at her home.

Edna Wiley LEXINGTON — Edna Grayce Wiley, 99, of Lexington died Sunday, May 22, 2016, at Plum Creek Healthcare Community in Lexington.

Jerry Jackson KEARNEY — Jerry A. Jackson, 64, of Loup City died Wednesday, May 18, 2016, at CHI Health Good Samaritan in Kearney.

Bill Stonerock BROKEN BOW — Bill Stonerock, 56, of Broken Bow died Thursday, May 19, 2016, at Golden Living Center in Broken Bow.

Lorma Lee Wiebe KEARNEY — Lorma L. Wiebe, 78, of Kearney died Monday, May 16, 2016, at her home. Lorma L. Wiebe

Jeff Jelken KEARNEY — Jeff Jelken, 50, of Kearney died Monday, May 16, 2016, at his home.

Pedro Araujo OMAHA — Pedro Felix “Pete” Araujo, 64, of Oxford died Thursday, May 19, 2016, at Nebraska Medicine in Omaha.

Gregorio Franco Salcido KEARNEY — Gregorio “Greg” Franco Salcido, 60, of Lexington died Thursday, May 19, 2016, at CHI Health Good Samaritan in Kearney.

Joanne Hardy KEARNEY — Joanne Hardy, 82, of Anselmo died Thursday, May 19, 2016, at CHI Health Good Samaritan in Kearney. Bob Lindly, Joanne Hardy

Agnes Leiphon KEARNEY — Agnes L. Leiphon, 94, of Kearney died Sunday, May 22, 2016, at Mount Carmel Home Keens Memorial.

article_metadata.description: KEARNEY — Instead of a birthday cake and candles, Barney Insurance is celebrating its 125th birthday with toilet paper, paper towels, toothpaste and deodorant.
